com.facebook.react.views.text

Class ReactTextUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.views.text.ReactTextUpdate

  • public class ReactTextUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains the data needed for a text update. Used by both and VisibleForTesting from TextInputEventsTestCase.

      Use a non-deprecated constructor for ReactTextUpdate instead. This one remains because it's being used by a unit test that isn't currently open source.
